name: panda-qry
short_description:
Data provider for Oracle, MySql, MsSql. 

It consists of two modules, an administration module "Panda-Adm" which requires an Oracle database (9 minimum)  and a requestor module  "Panda-Qry" that can work with Oracle, Mysql, MsSql databases for data.

"Panda-Adm", the administration module,  manages entirely universes as BO, it uses a Panda-Qry repository  and manages an unlimited number of universes. It provides all the functions of creation / export / import of universes and the management of the constituent elements, tables, aliases, joins, classes and objects.

"Panda-Qry", the module requestor,  is a data provider. You can edit your query intuitively and without knowledgeable about the SQL language, develop complex conditions, and then export the result rows in Excel, Word or other desktop tool so as to finalize the analysis, layout or edition.
summary: Data provider for Oracle, MySql, MsSql
